message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! However, I've had other interested buyers, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product for $135.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I still believe we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. I am willing to pay $125 for the product.
I'm glad we're still in the game, Bob! I'm willing to make another adjustment, but I need to make sure I'm covering my costs. I'm now offering the product for $140.
Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to meet my budget. I am now willing to pay $130 for the product.
I'm not quite ready to give up yet, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product for $145.
I'm grateful for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am now willing to pay $135 for the product.

I'm not getting any younger, Bob! I'm willing to make one final concession. I'm now offering the product for $150, but I'm not going any lower than that. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love it.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I am willing to pay $140 for the product.
